page.title: 08 Religion in Wootton.
page.content:
From our questionnnaire we found that the largest single group who replied to the question on what religious group they belonged to were Church of England. About half that number were Roman Catholic with a few Methodists, Church of Scotland and some given only as "Christians". There were also a number, roughly the same as the number of Roman Catholics, who said that they had no religious beliefs. Less than one third of the people who had religious beliefs said that they were regular attenders at services.
We interviewed a local clergyman. He said that the most important parts of his job were making people think and keeping them cheerful.
